Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.pipe

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EvaluationFunction<T extends Serializable>
    The general interface of all EvaluationFunctions.
    RecordHandler
    Similar to an EvaluationFunction this class can be added to a EvaluationPipeline.
    SubStreamPredicate
    This predicate implements the filtering of incoming UntypedValues to separate those which are to be processed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRecordHandler
    Implements the default methods AbstractRecordHandler.init() and AbstractRecordHandler.close().
    ChannelFilter<T extends Serializable>
    This class filters incoming MRecords by the channel identifiers of all elements inside the SubStream.
    ClonerUtil
    Clones serializable objects extracted from org.apache.flink.util.InstantiationUtil
    ClonerUtil.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
    Copied from flinks InstantionUtils.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream.
    EvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
    The context for evaluation in a EvaluationFunction containing ways to process incoming and outgoing data.
    EvaluationPipeline<T extends Serializable>
    This is a meta class.
    EvaluationPipeline.Builder<T extends Serializable>
    this Builder creates new instances of EvaluationPipeline class
    LambdaEvaluationFunction<T extends Serializable>
    Wraps the EvaluationFunction interface so that everything can be implemented as lambdas.
    SimpleEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
    Implementation of the EvaluationContext in a simple manner
    SubStream<T extends Serializable>
    This is a meta class.
    SubStream.Builder<R extends Serializable>
    Creates new instances of the SubStream class.
